title: [Yegharren Plain, High Plains]
description: The rolling, misty plain stretches in all directions, bounded by the dark forms of the distant hills.  Scattered stones and patches of brambles break the landscape here and there, and the steady wind pushes faint clouds of fog in an everchanging swirling pattern.

The misty, moonlit plain stretches in all directions, bounded by the dark forms of the distant hills.  Scattered stones and patches of brambles break the landscape here and there, and the steady wind pushes faint clouds of fog in an everchanging swirling pattern.
